timeline.bodyText:
Can you add a comment there explaining the defensive approach, as well a reference to a jira that tracks our efforts relaxing that defensive approach in the interest of performance?
Also, make sure that PhysicalDeletionIt still pass after this change.
timeline.author: arnaud-splice

timeline.message: DB-10690 SICompactionStateMutate shouldn't have public state
DB-10690 address code review / FlushProblemIT fails on mem
DB-10690 excluding FlushProblemIT from mem runs
